notes: Very modern luxury apartment in a high-end building with upscale amenities including a grand lobby and well-equipped gym. Kitchen features Bosch dishwasher and induction cooktop with glass backsplash. The unit appears unfurnished with clean white tile floors, digital door lock, and wall-mounted AC. For baby safety, the space looks clean with no visible stairs or dangerous balcony railings, though more photos of the full layout would be needed to fully assess.
